Anda merupakan Si Penakut ğŸ˜¾. Walaupon anda seorang penakut, anda telah membaca banyak buku berkaitan dengan alam mistik terutama perkara yang berkaitan dengan Orang Minyak. Anda akan menjadi orang minyak sekiranya orang minyak menyerang anda.

Anda merupakan seorang Inspektor ğŸ•µ. Pada siang hari, anda memerhatikan seorang untuk mengetahui perwatakannya. Orang Minyak berpeluang mengenali diri anda jika anda melihat mereka (berpeluang 40%).
Anda adalah seorang Penyangak ğŸ». Setiap hari anda suka mencuba pelbagai jenis dadah dan kebanyakan orang telah mengetahuinya kegiatan anda.
Anda merupakan seorang Pengawal ğŸ‘¼. Setiap malam anda memilih seorang untuk diselamatkan. Bagaimanapun, jika anda tersilap pilih, anda ada kemungkinan 50% untuk dibunuh.

Anda adalah seorang Guru Silat ğŸ”«. Anda boleh menggunakan jurus anda sebanyak dua kali untuk melawan segala jenis makhluk. Semua orang akan mendengar jeritan anda apabila anda mengeluarkan jurus itu.
Anda merupakan Makcik Kuih ğŸ’‹. Setiap malam anda akan memilih seorang untuk diberikan kuih yang tidak terjual pada siang hari. Anda akan dibunuh jika menghantar kuih ke tempat yang tidak selamat.

Anda adalah Si Kitol ğŸ–•. Buat masa sekarang, anda adalah orang kampung, tetapi apabila semua makluk halus tiada, anda menjadi Orang Minyak.Wartawan akan melihat anda sebagai orang minyak ataupun orang kampung.
ANDA ADALAH ORANG MINYAK ğŸº!! Setiap malam anda mencari mangsa lalu membunuhnya.Anda pakai pemutih pun tetap takkan putih
Anda seorang Wartawan ğŸ‘³. Setiap malam anda melihat seorang untuk dijadikan berita pada esok hari.
Anda adalah Orang Kampung ğŸ‘±, menjalankan kehidupan seperti biasa. Tiada kelebihan untuk anda.
Anda merupakan seorang Pembuat Bom ğŸ‘º. Anda akan meletupkan kawasan anda dan menyelamatkan diri sendiri jika dituduh melakukan sesuatu yang buruk dalam kampung.
Anda mempunyai Saka ğŸ‘¶. Anda boleh memilih seorang untuk dijadikan idola. Apabila idola anda mati, anda akan menjadi Orang Minyak.
Anda seorang Anonymous ğŸ‘, mencari dan maklumat tentang wartawan terpilih.
Anda adalah Wartawan Pelatih ğŸ™‡. Jika Wartawan telah hilang, anda akan mengambil tempat beliau.
Anda mempunyai fahaman yang pelik berkaitan tarianğŸ‘¤. Setiap malam anda memilih seorang untuk dijadikan pengikut anda. Anda akan menang jika semua baki pemain mengikuti anda.

Anda merupakan seorang Otai ğŸ’‚, cuba untuk menghentikan penyebaran tarian mengarut. Setiap malam anda pilih pemain. Jika mereka Budak Raver/Hipster, mereka akan hilang dari kawasan itu. Jika anda dihasut mereka, ahli sebelumnya akan hilang.
Anda merupakan seorang RELA ğŸ‘·. Anda mengenali rakan seperjuangan anda.

Anda seorang pencari jodoh ğŸ¹. Menghabiskan masa anda mempelajari ilmu pengasih, anda dapat memilih dua orang pemain untuk di jodohkan. Jika salah seorang mati, seorang lagi akan mati dalam kesepian.
Anda merupakan hantu raya ğŸ­. Anda mewarisi daripada nenek moyang anda dan boleh menyerupai sesiapa. Pilih seorang pemain, jika pemain itu mati, anda akan memainkan watak pemain tersebut.
Anda adalah Pemburu Hantu ğŸ¯. Anda tidak dapat tidur dengan nyenyak. Jika anda hilang, anda membawa seorang untuk temani anda.
Anda merupakan PontianakğŸ”ª yang sedang mencari mangsa untuk diratah
Anda adalah Tok KetuağŸ–. Tuduhan anda dikira dua kali apabila anda mendedahkan diri anda.
Anda merupakan VVIP ğŸ‘‘ dalam kampung. Apabila tuduhan ditujukan kepada anda, mereka mengakui melakukan kesilapan dan tiada orang yang dituduh pada hari itu.
Anda adalah Pak PandirğŸ¤•. Anda cuba untuk menuduh, tapi sayang tuduhan anda mempunyai 50% peluang ke arah orang selain yg anda pilih.
Anda adalah PawangğŸ”® yang berkawan dengan makhluk halus selain pontianak. Pada waktu malam, anda menggunakan jampi anda untuk membantu makhluk halus. Anda akan menang jika makluk halus menang.

Anda adalah seorang bomohâš’, air jampi yang sangat berharga. Anda akan menjampi air hujan. Air hujan yang dijampi dapat menghalang makhluk halus selain pontianak daripada mengganggu penduduk kampung pada malam itu.

Anda adalah Orang Bunian âš¡ï¸. Kegiatan anda menyebabkan penduduk kampung menjadi Orang Minyak. Setiap malam anda akan memilih orang untuk diganggu. Selagi anda masih hidup mangsa anda berpeluang 20% untuk dijadikan sebagai orang minyak.

Anda adalah PenanggalğŸ¶ yang disanjung makhluk halus yang lain selain pontianak. Sama seperti makhluk halus yang lain, anda memilih seorang untuk diganggu pada setiap malam. Jika anda hilang, rakan-rakan anda mengganas dan mencari dua mangsa untuk diganggu.
Anda dilamun cinta bersama {0}. Jika salah seorang hilang, seorang lagi akan membawa diri ketempat lain. Jika pasangan anda menang, anda juga akan menang.
Jampi pengasih telah mengenai diri anda! Anda mabuk di lamun cinta dengan {0}! Jika si dia hilang, anda turut hilang, jika si dia menang kamu berdua akan menang.
Peranan anda mudah, cuba untuk hidup dan singkirkan makhluk halus daripada kampung ini.
Anda adalah seorang wartawan pada setiap. Melalui peranan ini, pada setiap malam anda boleh memilih pemain lain untuk dilihat peranan mereka. Gunakan dengan bijak

You get to have fun! Each day, you will attempt to decieve your fellow players. However, each night, you will get to pick a player to kill!\nNote: If you attack the cursed, they will become a wolf like yourself! Hooray friends!\nIf you attack the drunk, you yourself will become drunk, and will be unable to do the next attack as you sleep off your hangover! (Usually, this means you can't attack the following night, but if the Wolf Cub was killed and the Drunk was your first choice, you won't be able to kill the second player, and you will still be able to attack the following night.)

As the harlot (you slut...) you will be given the chance to 'visit' another player each night. If they are not the wolf, you will be told so (because you live!). If you visit a wolf, you will be killed. If you visit the player the wolves have chosen to kill, you will be killed as well. However - If you are visiting a player, and the wolves choose to kill you, you will survive (you weren't home)
You drunken bastard! As the drunk, you are still just a villager. BUT! If the wolves kill you, they will become disabled for the next kill, as they are drunk off your insanely high BAC.
As the cursed, you are a normal villager... until the wolves kill you. Once they do, you will become a wolf as well! Free to hunt in the night..... XD
You are a traitorous bastard. If you survive long enough for all the wolves to die, you will become a werewolf, ready to kill your former teammates in the night!
You are the Guardian Angel! Each night, you may choose a player to watch over. Be careful however - if you choose to watch over a wolf, there is a 50% chance you will be killed.
You old sleuth. Each day, you will have the chance to investigate another player. Use this carefully however, for these is a 40% chance the werewolves will detect you!

A bit trigger happy are we? As the gunner, you are given 2 silver bullets at the beginning of the game. Each day, you will have the chance to shoot another player. Once you do, everyone will know you are the gunner! Be careful though, you only have 2 bullets!
The Tanners goal is simple: Get Lynched. If the Tanner gets lynched, he wins, period. Everyone else loses.
he fool is told they are the seer.... when they choose to see someone's role at night, they are told a random role.
As a cultist, it is your goal to convert all other players (except wolves) to your cult. If at the end of the game, all living players are cultist - the cult wins
Your job is to hunt the Cult. If the cult attacks you, their newest member will die. Each night you may pick a player to 'hunt' - if they are a cultist, they will die.
At the beginning of the game, you will choose someone to be your 'role model'. If they die, you become a werewolf.
For now, you are a normal villager. However, if the seer dies, you will become the new seer
You will be told who the seer is (the real one, not the fool)
A mason's job is simple - they automatically know who the other masons are. Otherwise, they are a simple villager.

Your ancestors had the ability to metamorph into others... while you don't have their full abilities, you can pick a player at the start of the game. If that player dies, you will become what they were. Note: If the player was converted to cult, you will take on their original role. All other normal rules apply: If they were Wild Child and their role model died, you will become a wolf. Otherwise, you will inherit their role model. The cult cannot convert the DoppelgÃ¤nger (but can after the doppelganger switches roles). Also - the DoppelgÃ¤nger can NOT win unless they have transformed. If at the end of the game, the DoppelgÃ¤nger is still the same, they lose (exception: lover)

Love is in the air. As Cupid, you will choose two players at the start of the game. These two players will become madly in love! If one of them dies, the other will die of sorrow :( Note: Lovers will know who each other are, but not be told their roles. If the lovers are the last two alive, they win, regardless of teams. If the lovers are on different teams (villager + wolf), and one team wins (wolf), the lover (villager) wins as well. TL;DR if at least one of the lovers was on the winning team, they both win together.

A trigger happy, vindictive player. As the hunter, you try to keep to yourself. However, when others come to visit you, they may find themselves dead, as your paranoia takes hold and you shoot. If the wolves attack you, you have a chance to take one of them with you. Otherwise, if you die, you will get a chance to shoot someone as you die. Note: For wolf attacks, the chance starts at 30%. If there is one wolf, the hunter has a 30% chance to kill the wolf (and survive). For each additional wolf, add 20% (2 wolves = 50%, 3 = 70%, etc). However - if there are multiple wolves, while you may kill one of them, you will still be outnumbered and killed. If the cult tries to convert you, they have a 50% chance to fail. If they fail, you have a 50% chance to kill one of them!

That asylum was silly anyways. What a joke. You are free now however, back to business as usual - killing! The serial killer is a lone player, on their own team. They can win only if they are the last player alive (exception: lovers). As the serial killer, you can kill ANYONE - wolves, hunters, gunners, guardian angels, whatever. If the wolves try to attack you, you will kill one of them (random), and live.

As mayor, you are a lowly villager, until you reveal yourself. Then you are given twice the vote count for lynching (meaning that your vote is twice as powerful as everyone else's). Use that power wisely to help the Village Team.

The prince is a key role in the Village Team's strategy. Once the prince gets lynched, their role as Prince is revealed, and they survive. However, this can only happen once: if the village insists on lynching them, they will die.
Do you remember the good old seer? Well now, it has its Wolf Team counterpart. The sorcerer is the Wuff's Seer. They can only see if someone is Wolf or Seer, and they win with the Wolves.

You are the Clumsy Guy. Maybe you should not have had so much alcohol for breakfast. You can't see a damn thing. Can you even vote for the person you want to? (You have a 50% chance to vote for someone random.)

You are the BlackSmith. Through the years, no blades nor swords gave you as much satisfaction as the Silver Blades the elves ordered.\nYou might have some silverdust left. Who knows ? It might *prevent Wolves from eating tonight* ğŸ¤”
You are the Alpha Wolf, the origin of the curse, the bane of banes. Every night, there's 20% chance that you will bite your pack's meal, and they will join your ranks instead of dying!

What a cuuuute little wuff. _tickles tickles_ -cough cough- As i was saying, you are the Wolf Cub and you _drops the mic_ -I just can't resist that. I think if anyone killed you, i'd give the wuffs two victims. You're too cute to die. I wouldn't be able to tickle you anymore-
Para is a silly developer that likes to bark at people. Maybe he's been messing with werewolves too long....Messing with werewolves is a very bad idea.
Anda Si Kitol!!! Anda menjadi orang minyak...
Anda telah di bunuh oleh orang minyak. Sebagai si Penakut, anda telah menjadi orang minyak!
Sewaktu malam, anda terasa aneh dan gatal-gatal badan anda dipenuhi dengan minyak bukan minyak masak dan bukan juga minyak ron95 mahupun ron 97... Anda adalah orang minyak!
{0} telah terkorban! Dalam kemarahan anda mandi dalam air minyak dan menjadi orang minyak! Geng anda adalah: {1}

{0} datang ke rumah anda semalam, bersedia untuk meghasut anda menyertai tarian pelik... Tetapi anda mengambil rotan dan memukul budak raver sehingga mati... {1} telah meninggal!
Anda masuk ke dalam rumah {0} dan mendapati mereka sedang melakukan tarian yang pelik. Anda mengeluarkan rotan dan memukul budak raver.
